verse.roman:
ye 'vaśiṣṭā raṇe tasmin
nāradānumatena te
baliṁ vipannam ādāya
astaṁ girim upāgaman

synonyms: ye—some of the demons who; avaśiṣṭāḥ—remained; raṇe—in the fight; tasmin—in that; nārada-anumatena—by the order of Nārada; te—all of them; balim—Mahārāja Bali; vipannam—in reverses; ādāya—taking; astam—named Asta; girim—to the mountain; upāgaman—went.
translation: Following the order of Nārada Muni, whatever demons remained on the battlefield took Bali Mahārāja, who was in a precarious condition, to the hill known as Astagiri.
